sentence.Network_en: I can't understand why we're trying to ram Shakespeare down their throats.
sentence.Network_cn: 我搞不懂我们为什么硬要他们学习莎士比亚的作品。

sentence.Network_en: Sore throats may be relieved by cold compresses.
sentence.Network_cn: 喉咙痛用冷敷布敷一下可能会好一些。

sentence.Network_en: The two merchants cut each other's throats in their business competition.
sentence.Network_cn: 这两个商人在商业竞争中自相残杀.

entry.def: Your throat is the back of your mouth and the top part of the tubes that go down into your stomach and your lungs.

example.ex: As she stared at him she felt her throat go dry.
example.tran: 她盯着他看的时候，感觉自己的喉咙发干。

entry.def: Your throat is the front part of your neck.

example.ex: His striped tie was loosened at his throat.
example.tran: 他的条纹领带松松地挂在脖子上。

entry.def: If you clear your throat, you cough once in order to make it easier to speak or to attract people's attention.

example.ex: Cross cleared his throat and spoke in low, polite tones.
example.tran: 克罗斯清了清嗓子，开始有礼貌地低声说话。

entry.tran: 向…反复灌输;向…不断强调;迫使…接受
entry.def: If you ram something down someone's throat or force it down their throat, you keep mentioning a situation or idea in order to make them accept it or believe it.

example.ex: I've always been close to my dad but he's never rammed his career down my throat...
example.tran: 我一直和爸爸很亲近，不过他从不强迫我继承他的事业。

example.ex: I can't understand why we're trying to ram Shakespeare down their throats.
example.tran: 我搞不懂我们为什么硬要他们学习莎士比亚的作品。

entry.def: If two people or groups are at each other's throats, they are quarrelling or fighting violently with each other.

example.ex: The idea that Billy and I are at each other's throats couldn't be further from the truth.
example.tran: 认为我和比利斗得你死我活的想法真是大错特错。

entry.def: If something sticks in your throat, you find it unacceptable.

example.ex: What sticks in my throat is that I wasn't able to win the trophy...
example.tran: 令我耿耿于怀的是自己没能获奖。

example.ex: She wanted to ask if he had news of Keith, but the words stuck in her throat.
example.tran: 她想问他有没有基思的消息，可是难以启齿。

auth_sentence.content: They don't cram it down everyone's throats.
auth_sentence.res_content: They don't cram it down everyone's throats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They don't cram it down everyone's throats.

auth_sentence.content: We could have had our throats cut while we slept.
auth_sentence.res_content: We could have had our throats cut while we slept.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We could have had our throats cut while we slept.

auth_sentence.content: Now this crowd wants to shove everything down our throats.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now this crowd wants to shove everything down our throats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now this crowd wants to shove everything down our throats.
